definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Look at my feet, grandma frozen stiff decided to make a pair of cloth padded boots.
sentences.chinese: 看着我凍僵的小腳，奶奶決定給我做一雙布棉鞋。

sentences.english: Those are my footprints when I was 14 days.
sentences.chinese: 這是我兩週的時候印的小腳印。

sentences.english: But the night that the taste of feet can be painful.
sentences.chinese: 不過晚上那小腳的滋味可痛了。

sentences.english: Opens extra wide to make it super-easy to get on and off busy little feet.
sentences.chinese: 打開超寬，超輕鬆地開始了繁忙的小腳丫。

sentences.english: These small tracks have a tiny point at the end of each toe.
sentences.chinese: 這些小腳印的腳趾末有一個細小的點。

sentences.english: She passed the Sally gardens with little snow-white feet.
sentences.chinese: 那時，她雪白的小腳正踏過莎莉花園。

sentences.english: He crashed the trolley through the doors.
sentences.chinese: 他推着小腳輪車乒乒乓乓地過了幾道門。

sentences.english: She passed the Salley Gardens, With little snow-white feet.
sentences.chinese: 她那一雙雪白的小腳款款走過柳園。

sentences.english: If jump when the chicken foot ankle injury, stone has been carrying her forward.
sentences.chinese: 跳傘時鳳小腳的腳腕受傷，苟金石一直揹着她前進。

sentences.english: Behind him he heard a quiet scuffling of small feet.
sentences.chinese: 從他身後他聽見一陣輕輕地小腳拖着腳走路的聲音。

sentences.english: "Queen, I love your feet and your high heels, " one fan commented.
sentences.chinese: “女王，我愛您的小腳和高跟鞋，”一位粉絲評論道。

sentences.english: She passed the salley gardens with little snow-white feet.
sentences.chinese: 她穿越莎莉花園，以雪白的小腳。

sentences.english: From the footprints it was possible to distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 從那一雙烏黑的小腳印可以看出。

sentences.english: I… I want to hear the pitter -patte of little feet again.
sentences.chinese: 我想再聽到小腳滴滴達達的聲音。

sentences.english: If you feel their little feet, they don't feel sticky at all.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感覺壁虎的小腳，它們不會覺得太黏。
石頭裏只有奇巧的“小腳”石派上了用處。
